title: Research Type Dependencies
description: The goal of this research is to list all of the projects type Dependencies.

queries.title: Explore Type Dependencies
queries.search: Explore Type Dependencies for the [list: Class Name] class
queries.questions: Create a definition for the [list: Class Name] class. Include the name of the class and a brief description. List all of its public & protected methods with signatures. List all of its public & protected properties with types. List all of its type dependencies.
